statements: SELECT * FROM training_equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM training_equipment WHERE condition = 'Good';
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM training_equipment WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_equipment WHERE location LIKE '%gym%';
SELECT equipment_name, condition FROM training_equipment WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY condition ASC;
SELECT * FROM training_equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM training_equipment WHERE condition = 'Good' ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_equipment WHERE location LIKE 'Gym%' AND quantity > 5;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, quantity, condition FROM training_equipment ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM training_equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, quantity FROM training_equipment;
SELECT * FROM training_equipment WHERE condition = 'New';
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, location FROM training_equipment ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM equipment_maintenance ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_equipment ORDER BY equipment_name ASC, quantity DESC
SELECT equipment_name, condition FROM training_equipment WHERE quantity > 5
SELECT maintenance_description FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM training_equipment WHERE condition = 'Good'
SELECT * FROM training_equipment INNER JOIN equipment_maintenance ON training_equipment.equipment_id = equipment_maintenance.equipment_id
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT name, condition FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT equipment_id, name, quantity FROM equipment WHERE condition = 'Good';
SELECT location_name, address FROM locations;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT name, condition FROM equipment WHERE equipment_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT equipment_id, name, quantity FROM equipment WHERE condition = 'Good'
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC

SELECT equipment.name, maintenance_logs.maintenance_date, locations.location_name FROM equipment JOIN maintenance_logs ON equipment.equipment_id = maintenance_logs.equipment_id JOIN locations ON locations.location_id = equipment.location_id
SELECT * FROM training_equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM training_equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, condition FROM training_equipment WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory ORDER BY procurement_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_cost > 500;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, location FROM training_equipment;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory WHERE procurement_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, condition FROM training_equipment ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_cost > 1000;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date, maintenance_notes FROM training_equipment JOIN maintenance_history ON training_equipment.equipment_id = maintenance_history.equipment_id;
SELECT * FROM equipment
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, condition FROM equipment
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM equipment ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, condition FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM equipment WHERE condition = 'good'
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY equipment_id DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, condition FROM equipment WHERE equipment_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, location FROM equipment WHERE condition = 'Good' OR condition = 'Fair' ORDER BY location, equipment_name;
SELECT equipment_name, log_date FROM equipment JOIN equipment_log ON equipment.equipment_id = equipment_log.equipment_id WHERE equipment_log.log_type = 'Repair' ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT technician_name, technician_specialty FROM technicians WHERE technician_experience > 5 ORDER BY technician_name ASC;
